Reviews.Title: “Nice & Clean !”
Reviews.Author: connie b
Reviews.Content: We had the Safari Room reserved for a month, the room was very large, nicely decorated and clean. The room was large enough for our elderly parents to feel comfortable and not confined, and nice to have a refrigeration/microwave in room . It was convenient for us to stay there while various family members were traveling to Dallas from other areas around Texas to be with a family member who was hospitalized. The staff got to know us as various members of the family was checking in and out during our month stay. They were concerned about our loved one and always asked how he was doing. The owner was most gracious and helpful to our entire family. We always enjoyed going for breakfast, the food was always hot, good and variey of items to choose from. The restaruant was good place to eat. It was so helpful having a washer/dryer on location and use of the shuttle service. The location was good, easy for us to get to downtown Dallas. I would highly recommend this hotel, the staff are wonderful!

Reviews.Title: “Very well located inn”
Reviews.Author: zangrande
Reviews.Content: It is an Inn and has all characteristic you should expect, but it is very well located and the staff is great.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: ch19861
Reviews.Content: Love this hotel. Great staff. Clean rooms and great breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing Service”
Reviews.Author: AzTravelFreak
Reviews.Content: Wow, is all I can say about this Ramada hotel and their staff. I have traveled extensively over the years for business and pleasure and have never come across a more attentive/cohesive staff. Honestly I never stay at Ramada Inns and reluctantly (in town for an industry trade show and all other hotels in the area were booked) made reservations based on trip advisor reviews from previous guests. Don't let the great price fool you, this place is a bargain not a run down hotel. It is by no means a luxury hotel and yes the basic structure is dated; however the rooms and common areas are kept very neat and clean. Where the truly amazing (above and beyond) service came in was with the complimentary shuttle this hotel provides. We never waited more than 5 minutes for a shuttle, most of the time we walked right onto the shuttle and they took us to our desired destination. Besides being very helpful EVERY shuttle driver had personality plus and really took pride in their company. Congratulations to the owner of this property, you can tell they eat, breath and sleep customer service and it shows. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Dallas area. Not only is it the best deal going, you will love their staff!

Reviews.Title: “Pets”
Reviews.Author: Rusty1Rochester_WA
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this property for the whole month of February 2011 with a pet, we stayed on the 1st floor. Well we liked it so much we came back 11/4/11 and we now have to stay on the 4th floor. I don't blame the owners for this I blame the people with pets who don't seem to care what there dogs do or where they do it. Also the door closest to our room dosen't work right when you take your pet out you can't come back in you have to walk all the way around to another door get back in, so if you are tired and your pet needs to do the doo plan on a walk! I will add that this is an excellent place to stay clean well furnished rooms and a resturant and lounge in house. Just beware with a pet you will have a little work involved with your stay..............and yes I would still recommend this Hotel to all my friends with or with out dogs!

Reviews.Title: “You made lemonade for us out of a lemon of a trip”
Reviews.Author: scookie58
Reviews.Content: A group of about 20 of us were stranded by American Airlines and the Super 8 hotel recently at the DFW airport. Once you were contacted, our experience was lifted immediately. You got to us as quickly as possible, you called in your kitchen staff (after midnight), who cooked us a hot meal and you put us up in very nice rooms. We hardly had time to enjoy the room but that 3 hour nap and a shower was desperately needed. Then you fed us breakfast and took us back to the airport as scheduled. Your desk clerk was extremely helpful as were your drivers and kitchen staff. I'm pretty sure that Super 8 lost the airline's business and that you will get additional reservations because of this particular issue. I hope so--your hotel deserves it.

Reviews.Title: “Ramada - good price good value”
Reviews.Author: johnnycalgary
Reviews.Content: What you expect from a ramada I have been as their rates are good Front desk staff is very friendly and gave us instructions to the Target store Thereâ€™s a upper class breakfast, eggs, sausages, muffins, juice, toast, raisin brans etc. The room was OK, no fuss, basic cable There is a nice pool with lawn chairs so thatâ€™s good Near a few fast-food restaurants and gas stations in the area Not too far from the airport but we didnt flew in or out of Dallas Good parking for our rented a car

Reviews.Title: “We loved it!”
Reviews.Author: SRG55
Reviews.Content: We had a fantastic time at Ramada! The service from every staff member we encountered was absolutely excellent. The hotel is old - it reminds me of my days of travelling as a child. And while this is an older facility, it is extremely clean and comfortable. We received a call within minutes of check-in to be sure our room was satisfactory, the shuttle service we requested to attend a concert, was on time, and the drivers were extremely friendly and personable. Clean, great rates, great staff, nice breakfast, what else can you ask for?

Reviews.Title: “Great caring hotel”
Reviews.Author: kris999111
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel through friend's recommendation. We had 4 rooms.They gave us boardroomforour personal use which alsohas business center. Great breakfast and shuttle service was awsome. We wereoffered water bottle right after we were picked up from lovefield airport. Go Ramada !!! Coming back for sure!!!

Reviews.Title: “Only redeeming factor is the Texas shaped waffles!”
Reviews.Author: ManilaBubba
Reviews.Content: Hotel has a dark, rather depressing feel to it... especially the lobby and the hallways and area surrounding the hotel. Rooms was fine, tho, and the bed was quite comfortable. I arrived at 1:30PM but the receptionist made me wait until 3PM to check-in. :( I waited in my car chowing down on Jack-in-the-Box and did noticed that the receptionist checked other peeps into the hotel before 3PM. Htl offers Texas shaped waffles which I found to be the only real redeeming value of the property... rest of bkfst offering was quite bland. I thought the fruits on offer... the apples and bananas were quite tired. I felt that at $69 per night regular rate was overpriced (I paid $48/nite because of a discount offered on 3 nites)... $35.00 per night would have been just perfect.

Reviews.Title: “We Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: dipli
Reviews.Content: I like this hotel because they have clean rooms and the customer service is great. They do have few problems, but which hotel doesn't problems. I travel to dallas every two months and i havent had any problems with the shuttle or the staff. I would recommend this hotel to all the people that travel for business or family reasons.

Reviews.Title: “A bad Hotel experience!”
Reviews.Author: Cynhoff
Reviews.Content: I just stayed for 4 days...there are problems! Most importantly, I came back to my room after working all day and the door to my room was left OPEN by the maid (I guess). Don't know for how long, nothing appeared to be missing. When I first got to my room, I removed the bedspread, as I always do, and the blanket was so old it was crunchy with several holes worn through. Actual holes! It was changed the next day, upon my request. Apparently , it is a contract hotel for a truccking company. In the morning at breakfast there are truckers at breakfast speaking loudly & on their cell phones speaking loudly. Not a comfortable environment for a business woman. I dropped a used tissue in the toilet before I left in the morning and it was still there when I came back at the end of the day after my room was cleaned. The reason that I chose this hotel was beacuse of the shuttle service. It turned out to be unreliable & erratic. It was 32 minutes late for the promised time to pick us up at the end of the work day, with us waiting outside in the heat. I will not stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “friendly staff and excellent service”
Reviews.Author: MaxFrost
Reviews.Content: I went to the Metroplex to do some shopping and stayed at the Love Field Ramada. The room was nice - clean and well kept. The grounds were also clean and the furniture and decorations added a pleasant touch to the overall experience. Most importantly, the staff were friendly and bent over backwards to make me feel welcome and were helpful in their suggestions on where to go and how to get around. I really enjoyed my stay there, hotels are so often impersonal and the staff remote.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely will stay again.”
Reviews.Author: tdwalters
Reviews.Content: This hotel is perfect for the traveler that wants a clean, comfortable room, at an excellent rate. I stayed with some friends when we went to the Dallas Zoo. The staff was very nice, especially the girl that helped us with our reservation. I think her name was Theresa. Very accommodating. The beds were comfortable; the breakfast was excellent; the pool was cool, clean and uncrowded; and the location is very close to the airport and downtown. I will definitely try to stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Good basic hotel but not for families”
Reviews.Author: JohnH8181
Reviews.Content: We were in Texas visiting family and needed a place to stay for the night to catch a 6 am flight from Love Field. Some of the reviews were mixed but we decided to give this hotel a try since it is a Ramada. For the price and proximity to Love Field the hotel can't be beat. In addition they have a free shuttle to the airport so that counts for a lot. The staff is very friendly. Now for the not so great. The hotel is very old and it shows but it seemed fairly clean. There was a definite musty order in our room that was unpleasant. The rooms are very small with 2 twin (not queen) beds which means sharing a bed with a spouse is not too comfortable. We were on the first floor next to the courtyard and it seemed like we were right next to the smoking area. A couple times during the night we were woken by people talking loudly while they smoked. Also the toilet handle broke on us and it was real fun having to put your hand in the back of the toilet to flush it. Still with complaints I have it served its purpose of a place to stay for the night next to the airport for a lot less money than they other area hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Rusty1Rochester_WA
Reviews.Content: Wonderful people on staff, excellent room, bed and very clean!

Reviews.Title: “great lodging experience”
Reviews.Author: Granby551
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Ramada for business trip. It was a 5 star experience for 3 star price.

Reviews.Title: “Consistent”
Reviews.Author: AmandaBirch
Reviews.Content: We were here for 5 days. The staff was attentive, the accommodations fine.We especially enjoyed the breakfast buffet.Great service and a very comfortable stay. Shuttle Service very nice. Greeted by kind staff who were always willing to help with advice on fun things to do. Room had plenty of space for 2 adults and 3 kids. Beds were very nice and the room was very clean.Breakfast each morning was exceptional and we also enjoyed the evening happy hour. My 6 and 8 year old did NOT want to leave the RAMADA. Special thanks to the front desk for all their kind service. We will definitely be back to this Ramada in the future!!------ Amanda Birch

Reviews.Title: “nice place and friendly staff.”
Reviews.Author: monk123
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Ramada for cowboys game even though it is far from stadium. Excellent brekfast and clean room...very friendly staff.Alsoused their transportation to near by bar. Great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Good basic hotel, but check your room for bed bugs”
Reviews.Author: mrseljefino
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel twice during our visit for a family wedding. After the first night, our son had three bites that turned out to be bedbugs (which we found out later). During the second stay (two nights later), and after sleeping in the room, we discovered bedbugs in the bed. We requested a second room which was also infested. Checked out, received a refund for the unused night. The employees "didn't know how this could happen", even when provided with evidence of the bugs. Other than this, hotel was pleasant enough, basic services, friendly staff. We did not see any adult bugs indicating that this was an early-stage infestation and could be dealt with relatively easily if they would act on it.

Reviews.Title: “affordable lodging”
Reviews.Author: deeznutztyper
Reviews.Content: This Ramada was a nice place to stay, despite its age as some mentioned. It looked like it was recently remodeled, but the elevators were still a bit old. The rooms were clean and staff were friendly. I really enjoyed the value of this hotel, its priced affordability and has the perks of the pricier hotels i.e. airport shuttle (which I didn't use, since I had my own car there) and hot breakfast (includes eggs, biscuits and gravy, and bacon). I would stay here again when I go back to Dallas.

Reviews.Title: “nice Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: m-schwabing
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed here and is a very clean place! The hotel was older but appeared to have been recently remodeled. The bed was nice, the linens were nice and the room was extremely clean. We have stayed at many hotels that cost much more and were not this clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful and the shuttle service staff were also very polite. I honestly can not think of anything bad to say about our stay here and would definately stay again. Its a little bit out of downtown... But it has a nice pool!

Reviews.Title: “Great value!”
Reviews.Author: TonyfmNYNJ
Reviews.Content: Hotel provided timely transportation from Lovefield airport, easy check-in and staff was very friendly. We had booked king rooms which were very clean. Next morning, hotel provided complimentary hot delux breakfast, which was terrific. We only had to wait 10 mins for ride to the airport. Overall good experience and great value. Tony from NY/NJ

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: SamPat33594
Reviews.Content: Came to Dallas for the NBA all star game. The rate was good and the front desk staff was friendly. The hot breakfast in the morning was wonderful and the place is clean. Excellent service for airport pickup and dropoff. Would definately stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable rooms, great price”
Reviews.Author: AndyNYNJ
Reviews.Content: Hotel provided transportation from Lovefield airport, easy check-in and staff was very friendly. I had booked king room which was clean and bathroom was spotless. Next morning, hotel provided comlimentary hot delux breakfast, which was outstanding. I had to wait 10 mins for ride to the airport. Overall good experience and will come back to this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “excellent service”
Reviews.Author: olgajohn
Reviews.Content: we came to this hotel from airport because of flight delayed. great customer service.Offered water bottle.Tranportation eas awsome..they took us for food at nearest restaurant area..Great price and value combination..

Reviews.Title: “Crawling bugs above bed headboard and in Bathroom”
Reviews.Author: cindyIndy
Reviews.Content: Weather delay requiring us to overnight in Dallas. Hotel room had distinct body odor smell. Bed coverings worn and stained and carpet needed replaced from stickiness and black stains. Small black bugs similar in size to fruit flies but without wings crawling above both bed head boards and above sink in bathroom. Only good thing is the manager refundedour room rate and did not argue the fact the Hotel had bugs. We did not spend the night and ended up at the Marriott which was bug free!

Reviews.Title: “Nice and Gr8 place”
Reviews.Author: andysmith8554
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for three days and the room were very clean and neat and the staff was very friendly. There was a small breakfast that was plenty to get the day going. The price was right and the parking was easy and free.

Reviews.Title: “great hotel”
Reviews.Author: sanjay11
Reviews.Content: Great hotel close to major freeway. Front deslk very helpfull, rooms were clean and in good condition. Parking lot needs some repair.Breakfast was awasome.

Reviews.Title: “I don't recommend this Ramada”
Reviews.Author: mardits
Reviews.Content: Stayed on Nov. 22nd and 23rd of 2008. Firstly, the front desk is not friendly and not helpful. Make sure to get your stay rate either faxed to you or printed out from your email confirmation..because they will try to play dumb and up the rate upon arrival. Also, if you book the Cowboy Package, as we did, make sure you have that in writing because they will try to charge you for the shuttle to the Stadium(which should be free). KEEP your Confrmation print out!!! Very important! Secondly, The water pressure was terrible..I had read it in the reviews before I booked and asked them about it over the phone. They assured me there was no problem with the water. NOT TRUE!! Not only did the water pressure suck..the pipes were very loud...and at 2:00 am...just imagine! Oh, The smoke alarm also woke us up twice in the early a.m. ...apparently for no reason. If you like to sleep, don't stay here!

Reviews.Title: “loved this place”
Reviews.Author: riyaricha
Reviews.Content: we stayed at this place for wedding. we made reservation just 24 hours before arrival.staff is very friendly and everyone in hotel helped us to get around and made our event successful.very clean rooms,great breakfast items.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel not bad, but couldn't receive refund!”
Reviews.Author: agoodLakeCharles_LA
Reviews.Content: We are from Louisiana and had a hurricane coming in our direction. We were issued a mandatory evacuation order so we booked two rooms at the Ramada. I booked the rooms through Expedia; BIG MISTAKE! The reservation was originally a four night stay, but because the evacuation order was lifted after two nights we checked out early. The hotel assured my mother that she could contact Expedia for the refund for the remaining nights. I contacted Expedia several times and received unsatisfactory service several times. Finally, I was able to speak with a rep that was helpful. He contacted the hotel for approval to issue my mother's refund and was denied by the hotel because apparently the rate was a special rate and my mother had to stay for three nights. I told him that she could be charged for the extra night and be refunded for the fourth day. The hotel would not help. Expedia did issue my mother a $50 hotel voucher (that she will probably never use!) in the end. I also tried contacting the Ramada customer service and they were not helpful either. So, my advice is if you are an evacuee for a hurricane or any other act of God, DO NOT STAY AT THE RAMADA. They will not be sympathetic to your situation.

Reviews.Title: “This hotel was good for family of 4.”
Reviews.Author: almghtybeanchild
Reviews.Content: My mother stayed in a king, and my wife, 2 kids and I received the 2 double bed suite. The rooms were good. The service was great. The breakfest was unexpectedly great. The pool area doesn't look dingy and is fenced in. Very cool gazebo. Did not feel unsafe, as it is a very industrial area. Industrial area's on weekend are not bad at all to stay around. I do not enjoy staying around residential area's that are poor. The place is fenced in to only one entrance. The location was great. Our complaints. The wallpaper or color of the walls was very uncomforting. This meaning that the walls looked dirty because of it. The lobby was always hot, the side door closest to the entrance did not work with key (not a big deal at all seeing as how the front door is about 15 ft. from this) Beds were hard.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty clean and comfortable- bad location”
Reviews.Author: rbaron721
Reviews.Content: Not much to say. This place was very decent, clean & comfortable. It is situated not too far from a sleazy strip club in a bad location. I would recommend this place to a single business traveler who has no interest in seeing the nice parts of Dallas. Good hotel for the price.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: CalamityJane55
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed here and found it to be extremely clean. The hotel was older but appeared to have been recently remodeled. The bed was nice, the linens were nice and the room was extremely clean. We have stayed at many hotels that cost much more and were not this clean. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the shuttle service staff were also very polite. I honestly can not think of anything bad to say about our stay here and would difinately stay again.

Reviews.Title: “excellent place for the price”
Reviews.Author: charles77Hartford
Reviews.Content: we stayed at ramada lovefield for one night. we checked in around 6.30pm.there was complimentary starbucks coffee in the lobby and real good continental breakfast in the morning.next day, we're dropped off at lovefield airport right at time.and shuttle driver was very helpful.24 hours business center was really great.we'll be definitely back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay After a Trying Day!”
Reviews.Author: GoingEverywhere
Reviews.Content: During a day of nasty weather at DFW Airport, our flight was hopelessly delayed for 11+ hours. We were finally de-planed at Love Field and had an unplanned night in Dallas. Many of us from the flight booked a room at the Ramada Inn. While everything around DFW was booked, this hotel near Love Field had plenty of rooms and a shuttle. I booked a AAA rate for around $75 for two. It was a great end to a memorably bad day! The room was clean, and ours had a view of a nice outdoor pool. The beds were good, the shower was strong, and the internet access was free and reliable. After a good night's sleep, we had the hotel's continental breakfast. It included muffins and a waffle bar. Good coffee, too! It was nothing memorable, but there was plenty of food and it was kept clean by staff. The shuttle was great! It's free from Love Field, and we were charged $5 each to DFW the next morning (it was cheap because there were so many people from our re-routed flight in the van -- I believe he collected $35 total for the trip). On the way over from Love Field the night before, we asked the driver if there was any food near Ramada (the plane had no food), and he went through the drive-through at Whataburger, about a block away. Yup, it was that kind of day! The neighborhood didn't look all that great between Love Field and the Ramada, and we all quietly wondered what we were gettting into. But the hotel was terrific and exactly what we needed after a long day in the sky (and sitting on the tarmac).

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Clean Hotel”
Reviews.Author: cokerbud
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel and had five rooms. They were all clean and neat and the staff was very friendly. There was a small breakfast that was plenty to get the day going. The price was right and the parking was easy and free. I had meetings in downtown and it took less than 10 minutes to get downtown in the morning traffic. I would definitely stay here again. For what I paid for 5 rooms per night at the Fairfield Inn I could not have stayed in one room where the meetings were held. It is a great value and served its purpose well.

HotelInfo.Name: Ramada-Dallas Love Field
HotelInfo.Address: 1575 Regal Row, At Stemmons Freeway, Dallas, TX 75247-3619
